Articles.Content:
I was just wandering if there are any mods that make the Spaceplane parts look more spacey/awesome like this:

http://m.imgur.com/a/azx3o

I like B9 and LLL but I want a mod that just changes to look of the mk1, mk2 and mk3 parts, without adding parts. Preferably 1.1.x. Thanks in advance!

1. Go get texture replacer and learn how to use it
  2. Make your own textures and put them on the forums
  3. ???
  4. Profit
Edited June 11, 2016 by cbplayer2012
